remarks: Commutative law for vector (functional) addition.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
ldualvaddcom.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualvaddcom.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualvaddcom.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) $.
ldualvaddcom.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldualvaddcom.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. F ) $.
ldualvaddcom.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. F ) $.
ldualvaddcom $p |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) $.
